DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if haplotype-mismatched HSCT is associated with an improvement in treatment-related mortality (TRM) rate at 6 months.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Haplotype Mismatched HSCT in Patients With Hematological Malignancies
